column4: can anybody help me?? yesterday i install ubuntu 11.10 un my laptop, no problems until this morning... reboot i didn't start, it freezes on login screen (sorry, english is not my first language)
really ... can you switch to text console even?  (control-alt-f1), do the toggle keys toggle?  (caps lock, num lock, scroll lock)
switch to text console?  toggle keys?
